channel.title: Delta fish spots ( how i move them )
channel.description: How do i move fishing spots on an delta based?

item.title: Delta fish spots ( how i move them )
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

fishing spots are npcs’s so you would find them in autospawn.cfg

item.title: Delta fish spots ( how i move them )
item.dc:creator: @Zacmaster22 Zacmaster22
item.description:
@Zacmaster22 wrote:

in delta or in other 317s it is found in Autospawn.cfg all you do is find the id of the fishing spot and the type the coords of it and the id in there and boom its there its not a global object.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta fish spots ( how i move them )
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

hmm… i think in deltabased files u have to go to the folder that is labeled Data… and then find Objects.cfg or something

and if u dont have a makeglobalobjects in ur client.java… then post this under the sendquest… and st00f…

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject((INSERT X CO), (INSERT Y CO), (OBJECT ID), 0, 10);

Read full topic
